data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=I2RCNR0_glsQ7kNvgG-HAaB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDln9aSvsXe-t8bst0HJP6D8KZIy8kj_HE_Kn5tREHmtw&oe=66CDCC8C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2S9fz-TgkAQQ7kNvgEmKNoR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA5fgs7KfOa5QNaz0Vc_6dEM8z4sDIr3lSC0DEDWzWvIQ&oe=66CDCA9F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vQrp7rlWmnEQ7kNvgEhLdd_&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDXkc3Oh109BiJ3x6tpOjAX62kcsjiHyX7s32H2vc8IGg&oe=66CDAFF1)
